title: BR Launch Configuration
description: Launch configuration for Business Rules! programs

executable.description: Path to BR executable. Can use variables: ${workspaceFolder}, ${extensionPath}, ${file}, ${fileBasename}. Defaults to ${extensionPath}/Lexi/brnative.exe

wbconfig.description: Path to wbconfig file (e.g., wbconfig.sr). Will be passed as -[filename] argument. Leave empty to use BR's default behavior. Can use variables: ${workspaceFolder}, ${extensionPath}, ${file}, ${fileBasename}

wsid.description: Workstation ID. Examples: '42' (-42), '42+' (-42+ auto-increment by 1), '21+5' (-21+5 increment by 5), 'WSIDCLEAR' (-WSIDCLEAR), '+5' (+5 increment only). Leave empty to use BR's default.

cwd.description: Working directory for the BR executable. Defaults to the folder containing the current file. Can use variables: ${workspaceFolder}, ${fileDirname}
